channel.title: Competition on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Competition on Ex Machina

item.title: Colluding Algorithms
item.description: When algorithms collude to fix a price higher than what would ordinarily have been set, the consumer suffers. Competition regulators will need to consider these sorts of challenges as new technologies begin to throw up more and more competition issues. They may be better served by automatic audits and real-time enforcement.
